page.title: 12Richard's Day.
page.content: Most days I get up at 7.30 and I wash, clean my teeth and dress before going downstairs to have a breakfast of cornflakes and a piece of toast with jam.I look after my two brothers until 8.00 when I make my sandwiches for lunch.I watch television until I go to school by car.School starts at 8.50 with registration and then assembly.I work at various subjects until morning break at 10.45 when I play football with my friends.From 11.00 to 12.00 I do more work and then we have time for quiet reading.Our lunchtime lasts from 12.15 to 1.30 and we eat in the main hall.We have other activities in the afternoon and school finishes at 3.15. After school I ride on my bicycle or play in the field.Then I go to Cubs where we play games,like taking keys silently from a blind-folded person.I read until 8.30 when I go to bed.
